sentences.en: A matter of repeated occurrence like this will not astonish people.
sentences.cn: 这样司空见惯的事,不会使人吃惊.

sentences.en: Complaints seemed to be an everyday occurrence.
During the contest an unlucky occurrence hurt his cause exceedingly.
sentences.cn: 争论中,不幸发生的事极大地损害了他的事业.

sentences.en: Evidence is lacking, however , as to their occurrence in other animal phyla.
sentences.cn: 微体在其他动物门的存在, 尚缺乏证据.

sentences.en: Flooding in the area is a common occurrence.
For a military commander, winning or losing a battle is a common occurrence.
For months at a time, air raids were a nightly occurrence.
sentences.cn: 一度有几个月，每天晚上都会发生空袭。

sentences.en: Knowledge of the occurrence of chromite deposits is likewise incomplete.
sentences.cn: 对于铬铁矿矿层产状的了解同样是不完整的.

sentences.en: Laughter was a rare occurrence in his classroom.
sentences.cn: 他的课堂上难得有笑声。

sentences.en: Ron's example illuminates an everyday occurrence: job rotation tears apart relational ties.
sentences.cn: 罗恩的例子解释了一件每天都发生的事情: 工作变动撕破了关系的纽带.

sentences.en: The frequent occurrence of earthquakes in the area means that the buildings must be specially designed to withstand the force.
sentences.cn: 该地区地震频发，这意味着建筑物必须有专门的抗震设计

sentences.en: The greatest occurrence of coronary heart disease is in those over 65.
sentences.cn: 65岁以上者是冠心病的最高发人群。

sentences.en: The man can neither originate varieties, nor prevent their occurrence.
sentences.cn: 人类既不能创造变种, 亦不能阻止变种发生.

sentences.en: The occurrence of malodor has obvious seasonal.
sentences.cn: 恶臭的发生具有明显的季节性。

sentences.en: The occurrence of storms delayed our trip.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨延误了我们的旅行.

sentences.en: The occurrence of such things is by no means fortuitous.
sentences.cn: 出现这种问题绝不是偶然的.

sentences.en: The occurrence of the disease is apparently related to standards of hygiene.
sentences.cn: 这种病的发生率显然与卫生状况相关.

sentences.en: Two things account for its occurrence.
sentences.cn: 发生这件事的原因有两个.

words.tran_cn: 正在发生的；偶然发生的
发生,事件,机会,事故,惊险活动
